attributes.action: Allow students to wear face coverings in schools
attributes.additional_details: My daughter was punished by her secondary school for refusing to remove her face mask while she was at school. On the other hand, her school had numerous Covid-19 cases. Face coverings are an efficient barrier to the transmission of the virus. Students should be allowed to wear a face covering anywhere at school during the pandemic. Students should not be punished for wearing their face coverings if they would like to.
attributes.background: Students should be allowed to wear face coverings anywhere in schools if they want to, including classrooms.
